Question 1 What comic book did Spider-Man first appear in? Amazing Fantasy #15 // answer Amazing Spider-Man #1 Action Comics #1 Marvel Tales #17
Question 2 What was the first Spider-Man spin-off series? Sensational Spider-Man Marvel Team-Up Spectacular Spider-Man // answer Ultimate Spider-Man
Question 3 Which superhero convinced Spider-Man to reveal his secret identity to the publ2c in Amazing Spider-Man #533? Captain America Daredevil Mr. Fantastic Iron Man // answer
Question 4 Who was Spider-Man\'s first girlfriend? Mary Jane Watson Felicia Hardy Gwen Stacy // answer Betty Brant
Question 5 In The Superior Spider-man series, which super-villain replaced Peter Parke4 as Spider-man? Doctor Octopus // answer Green Goblin Mysterio Kraven The Hunter
